title-group.article-title: Error Analysis of a Boundary Element Collocation Method for a Screen Problem in R<sup>3</sup>.

abstract.p: We examine the numerical approximation of the first-kind integral equation on a plane rectangle defined by the single-layer potential of the three-dimensional Laplacian. The solution is approximated by nodal collocation with piecewise bilinear trial functions on a rectangular grid. We prove stability and convergence of this method in the Sobolev space <tex-math>$\tilde H^{-1/2}$</tex-math>. A key ingredient in the proof is the observation that the collocation equations define symmetric positive definite Toeplitz matrices.
